#summary Jaderogue - a roguelike java library

= Jaderogue Library =

Jaderogue is meant to be a simple to understand and use roguelike library for Java. You should be able to quit thinking about game mechanics and just start thinking about your game.

= News =

Jaderogue is constantly being updated. Look under changes in the source tab!

= Contact =
